page.title: 20Ravensbank: facts & figures.
page.content:
A class of 7 year old children at Ravensbank First School discovered the following information about themselves and their homes:{ {Children in Types of {family. % house. % 1 15 Detached 32 2 50 Semi-detached 32 3 19 Terraced 36 4 12 { 5 4 {T.V.s per home. % Monochrome 5 {Cars per }Colour 50 {family. % }1 mono & 1 col. 27 0 27 2 mono & 1 col. 5 1 50 2 colour 13 2 23
33% of homes contain a {computer. 90% of the children own a{bicycle. 54% of the children have flown on an{ {aeroplane.}
